description: St. Jerome Hearing the Trumpet of the Last Judgment; Antonio Castillo y Saavedra (Spanish, 1616 - 1668); 1645 to 1650; Reed pen and brown ink, heightened with white gouache on light blue-green prepared paper; black chalk and dark brown ink framing lines; 29.4 × 19.8 cm (11 9/16 × 7 13/16 in.); 94.GA.87; J.
